resources:
iq ContactsActivity Contacts Memory leak was caused by process global static object sMemoryLeaksActivity which holds strong reference to just destroyed MemoryLeaksActivity. That destroyed activity will not be garbage collected due to the strong reference.
Memory leak was caused by process global static object View sView which holds strong reference to just destroyed MemoryLeaksActivity. That destroyed activity will not be garbage collected due to the strong reference.
Memory leak was caused by having a static reference to an instance of an inner class of MemoryLeaksActivity class. Inner class has access to outer class variables and thus holds reference to the outer class instance.
